briefTitle: Immersive Virtual Reality Based Exersice in Post-mastectomy Lymphedema Patients
officialTitle: Immersive Virtual Reality Based Exersice and Shoulder Proprioception and Range of Motion in Post-mastectomy Lymphedema Patients
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* All the patients will be females.
* Patients with lymph node dissection.
* start at least 2 weeks after operation.

Exclusion Criteria:

* Vision problems.
* Medically instable patients.
* Balance disorders.
* Other musculoskeletal condition of shoulders.
